```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)#dataset
library(plotly)
library(DT)
library(fontawesome)
data("penguins")

```

plots
======================

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Scatterplot bill_length_mm  vs  bill_depth_mm,

```{r}
a <- penguins |> 
        ggplot(aes(bill_length_mm, 
                   bill_depth_mm,
                   color = species)) + 
        geom_point()

ggplotly(a)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
penguins |> 
        ggplot(aes(flipper_length_mm, 
                   fill = species)) + 
        geom_histogram()+
        facet_wrap(~species)
```

### Chart C

```{r}
penguins |> 
        ggplot(aes(body_mass_g, 
                   sex,
                   fill = sex)) + 
        geom_boxplot() 
```
